channel.title: Learning PHP with Flash
channel.description:
Hello, I am learning PHP and Flash/Actionscript. I already know some basic stuff, like linking it a MySQL database and creating XML in PHP for my Flash Pro 8 :| , but I'm trying to learn how to use Flash 8 with PHP to create a webchat, and forums. (Yes, there will be a regular, HTML/PHP version, but I'm trying to make it look "cool" so that I get more viewers.) I'm just now learning how to create MySQL databases (I know, basic stuff) for my PHP to hold my members. How could I use that with a flash web chat and forums? It'd open a lot more doors for my programming future, and I'm hoping my website will help loads other beginners such as myself. Also, if I'm going to have to learn more Java than a "Hello World" script, tell me, I'm ready to learn anything at this point.
Thank you beforehand, Zeh Progage

item.title: Learning PHP with Flash
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

this might help
http://www.kirupa.com/developer/flash8/php5sockets_flash8.htm

item.title: Learning PHP with Flash

item.description:
@Zeh_Progage wrote:

Hello, I am learning PHP and Flash/Actionscript. I already know some basic stuff, like linking it a MySQL database and creating XML in PHP for my Flash Pro 8 , but I’m trying to learn how to use Flash 8 with PHP to create a webchat, and forums. It’d open a lot more doors for my programming future, and I’m hoping my website will help loads other beginners such as myself.
Also, if I’m going to have to learn more Java than a “Hello World” script, tell me, I’m ready to learn anything at this point.
